thread.title: BOE Official Says Finance, Manufacturing Behind U.K. Productivity Slump

author: Jason Douglas
title: BOE Official Says Finance, Manufacturing Behind U.K. Productivity Slump
text:
LONDON—A top Bank of England official on Monday blamed finance and manufacturing for the U.K.’s poor productivity performance over the last decade.
Silvana Tenreyro, who joined the rate-setting Monetary Policy Committee in July, said in a speech that a slowdown in productivity in those two sectors accounts for around three-quarters of the decline in economywide productivity since 2009.
